Dear Chuck
YES!  The Rokumeikan was in the last scenes of Lady Snowblood!  =
(^_^)
It was scandalous on many levels to the people of the time...women
da=
ncing with foreigners and so forth.  The newspapers had a field day
after e=
ach event.  The Rokumeikan was also a feature film directed by
KON ICHIKAWA=
 and a play written by YUKIO MISHIMA.

I highly recommend fanfic writers to=
 look into the
Rokumeikan---history provides some pretty interesting backdr=
ops to
stories.

::sigh:: the best part of the vid didn't survive (near the=
 end)---I
grabbed images of waltzing folks from google, produced silhouette=
s and
animated them in different layers at different rates---really looked
=
like they were dancing.

Oh well--just 2 hrs down the drain

I would never =
recommend Windows movie maker to anyone who wishes to
make a music vid.


-=
